trigger.match: ^You fall on your face as your legs are suddenly pulled out from under you\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_trip__

trigger.match: ^A sharp pain erupts in your chest\, and (?:your (?:neck|forehead|temple) throbs|blood trickles out of your (?:nose|ear|eye))\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_burst__

trigger.match: ^.+? floats around you\, then dives at you\.\nIt painfully stabs you\!$
trigger.name: telekinesis_animatedagger__

trigger.match: ^The air around you suddenly erupts into flames\, scorching your body\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_pyre__

trigger.match: ^A sudden force lifts you up off the ground and flings you into the air\. (You go sailing into the sky|You hit the ceiling with an awful crunch and drop to the ground)\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_fling__

trigger.match: ^You put a hand to your throat as an invisible force tightens around your neck and chokes you\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_choke__

trigger.match: ^An invisible force swipes by your leg\, causing you to fall over\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_psychicfist_fall__

trigger.match: ^As the pain of your broken jaw sets in\, you are filled with a sense of confusion\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_psychicfist_confuse__

trigger.match: ^You are briefly stunned by the snapping of your ribcage\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_psychicfist_stun__

trigger.match: ^You gasp as a surging pain strikes you in your (left|right) (arm|hip)\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_clot__

trigger.match: ^You cough as something gets lodged deep in your throat\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_throatlock__

trigger.match: ^A tingling sensation ripples over your skin and you begin to sweat profusely\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_sweat__

trigger.match: ^A force field around ([A-Z][a-z]+) flares\, absorbing all damage\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_forcefield__

trigger.match: ^(?:The air in the room suddenly sizzles with energy|A strange force prevents you from moving that way)\.$
trigger.name: telekinesis_barrier__
